results.title: The Dutch TIA trial: protective effects of low-dose aspirin and atenolol in patients with transient ischemic attacks or nondisabling stroke. The Dutch TIA Study Group.

results.title: A single-blind, placebo-controlled study of effects of atenolol on transient ischemia in "mixed" angina.

results.title: Effects of drug therapy on cardiac arrhythmias and ischemia in hypertensives with LVH.
results.text_hl: The present study shows that in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@, antihypertensive treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and SR-V reduces @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LVH@@@ and decreases the prevalence of @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@CA@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Attack_Transient</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002546 @@@TEMI@@@.

citations.NLM: Novo S, Abrignani MG, Novo G, Nardi E, Dominguez LJ, Strano A, Barbagallo M. Effects of drug therapy on cardiac arrhythmias and ischemia in hypertensives with LVH. Am J Hypertens. 2001 Jul;14(7 Pt 1):637-43. PMID: 11465647
citations.BibTeX: @article{11465647, title={Effects of drug therapy on cardiac arrhythmias and ischemia in hypertensives with LVH.}, author={Novo S and Abrignani MG and Novo G and Nardi E and Dominguez LJ and Strano A and Barbagallo M}, journal={Am J Hypertens}, volume={14}, number={7 Pt 1}, pages={637-43}}

results.title: Impaired glucose tolerance increases stroke risk in nondiabetic patients with transient ischemic attack or minor ischemic stroke.
results.text_hl: METHODS: In total, 3127 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with a @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Attack_Transient</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002546 @@@TIA@@@ or minor @DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@ participated in the Dutch @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Attack_Transient</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002546 @@@TIA@@@ Trial, testing 2 different doses of @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ versus placebo.

citations.NLM: Vermeer SE, Sandee W, Algra A, Koudstaal PJ, Kappelle LJ, Dippel DW, Dutch TIA Trial Study Group. Impaired glucose tolerance increases stroke risk in nondiabetic patients with transient ischemic attack or minor ischemic stroke. Stroke. 2006 Jun;37(6):1413-7. PMID: 16627787
